item.title: 泽连斯基称停火前线应保持 "沉默
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）说，在美国提议的 30 天休战开始之前，前线应该有一个受监督的 "沉默 "期。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said a period of monitored “silence” on the frontline should come before the start of the 30-day truce proposed by the US.】

item.title: 美联储减息观点不变，美债摆脱通胀降温影响
item.description: 由于全球贸易战升级的前景和美国经济增长滞后给一份冷于预期的通胀报告蒙上了阴影，国债下跌。【原文：Treasuries fell as the prospect of an escalating global trade war and lagging growth in the US overshadowed a cooler-than-expected inflation report.】

item.title: 欧佩克+石油产量激增，哈萨克斯坦进一步突破配额
item.description: 欧佩克+"原油产量上月激增，原因是长期以来一直蔑视卡特尔产量配额的哈萨克斯坦进一步突破了其商定的限额。【原文：OPEC+ crude production surged last month as Kazakhstan, which has long flouted the cartel’s output quotas, further breached its agreed limit.】

item.title: 据说波罗的海航空公司最快将于下一季度在伦敦上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拉脱维亚波罗的海航空公司（Air Baltic Corp AS）正在考虑最快于第二季度在伦敦证券交易所上市。【原文：Latvia’s Air Baltic Corp AS is considering going public on the London bourse as soon as the second quarter, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行希望美国消费者监管机构撤消它们厌恶的规则
item.description: 对于消费者金融保护局的问题，金融公司很少避讳。但是，一个基本被关闭的消费者监督机构正在给该行业带来自己的问题。【原文：Financial companies were rarely shy about their issues with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau. But a largely shuttered consumer watchdog is creating its own problems for the industry.】

item.title: 美国关税引发邻家 "好友 "的愤怒
item.description:
随着钢铁和铝进口措施的生效，加拿大总理将 CERAWeek 讨论会变成了发泄会。【原文：

Canadian premiers turned a CERAWeek panel into a venting session as measures on steel and aluminum imports take effect.

】

item.title: 美国通胀率低于预期，令人稍感宽慰
item.description: 2 月份，美国消费者价格以四个月来最慢的速度上涨，在通胀进展数月停滞不前之后带来了一些缓和。【原文：US consumer prices rose at the slowest pace in four months in February, offering some reprieve after months of stalling inflation progress.】

item.title: 南非成立二十国集团小组解决非洲债务膨胀问题
item.description: 南非在担任 20 国集团主席国期间成立了一个专家小组，以解决非洲的问题，包括非洲大陆的高债务负担。【原文：South Africa established an expert panel to address issues in Africa during the country’s chairmanship of the Group of 20 economies, including the continent’s high debt burden.】

item.title: 南非借款需求略有上升；Eskom 转移资金削减
item.description: 根据周三公布的预算审查报告，国家财政部将政府在 2025-26 财年的借款需求总额提高至 5,820 亿兰特，而 2024 财年的预测为 5,790 亿兰特。【原文：National Treasury increases government’s gross borrowing requirement for the 2025-26 fiscal year to 582 billion rand, compared with 579 billion rand forecast in 2024, according to budget review published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 南非重新修订预算案的赢家和输家
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）在周三提交给立法者的修订预算中削减了开支并调整了税收组合，而在此之前三周，南非联合政府拒绝了他的最初计划。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana cut spending and adjusted the tax mix in a revised budget that was presented to lawmakers on Wednesday, three weeks after the nation’s coalition government rejected his initial plan.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行转换德国商业银行股份需要反垄断批准
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在考虑将德国商业银行衍生品转换为股票之前，联合信贷银行需要获得德国反垄断机构的批准，以及欧洲中央银行的绿灯。【原文：UniCredit needs to get approval from Germany’s antitrust authority, in addition to a green light from the European Central Bank, before it can consider a conversion of its Commerzbank derivatives into shares, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 南非财政部长 2025 年预算要点
item.description: 以下是南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦宣布的南非 2025 年预算要点。【原文：Below are the highlights of South Africa’s 2025 budget announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Cape Town on Wednesday.】

item.title: 南非建议小幅上调增值税以结束预算僵局
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）提议减少消费税的增长幅度并抑制支出，以期在上一轮预算案被否决后，赢得国内分裂的执政联盟对预算案的支持。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana proposed scaling back consumption-tax increases and curbing spending in a bid to win support for the budget from the nation’s fractious governing coalition after a previous iteration was shot down.】

item.title: 巴西物价创 2022 年以来最大涨幅，卢拉再遭重创
item.description: 上个月，巴西的消费价格创下了三年来的最大涨幅，这给总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）带来了减轻购物者痛苦的压力。【原文：Brazil’s consumer prices surged the most in three years last month, piling pressure on President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva to ease shoppers’ pain.】

item.title: 欧洲重整旗鼓，债券基金撕毁规则手册
item.description:
信贷投资者正争先恐后地寻找环境、社会和治理方面的变通办法，为国防公司提供融资。【原文：

Credit investors are scrambling to find ESG workarounds to finance defense companies.

】

item.title: 米莱政策使比索坚挺，阿根廷人放弃外出就餐
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱的阿根廷，在家做饭从未如此有意义。【原文：In Javier Milei’s Argentina, cooking at home never made more sense.】

item.title: 亚马逊一度的收购目标 iRobot 发出前景堪忧的信号
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. 曾计划以超过 10 亿美元收购的消费机器人公司 IRobot Corp.【原文：IRobot Corp., the consumer robotics company that Amazon.com Inc. once planned to buy for more than $1 billion, slid on Wednesday after raising a “substantial doubt” about its ability to continue operating.】

item.title: 特朗普将很快宣布鲍曼为美联储最高银行官员的提名人选
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府最快将于今天提名美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）担任负责监管事务的副主席。【原文：The Trump administration will nominate Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman as vice chair for supervision as soon as today, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份 CPI 报告分析
item.description: 一名顾客在加利福尼亚州旧金山的 ACE 五金店内浏览商品。美国劳工统计局定于 3 月 12 日公布美国消费者价格指数（CPI）数据。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A customer browses products in an ACE hardware store in San Francisco, California. The Bureau of Labor Statistics is scheduled to release US consumer price index (CPI) figures on March 12. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 德国收益率接近 3% 的里程碑，历史性地转向更多债务
item.description: 德国基准收益率近 18 个月来首次触及 3%，这是因为人们预期德国将出现历史性的债务发行高峰，这对德国证券构成了压力。【原文：Germany’s benchmark yields are within touching distance of hitting 3% for the first time in almost 18 months, as expectations of an historic debt issuance surge weighs on the securities.】

item.title: 玻利维亚新的国家黄金交易商希望今年的采购额达到 10 亿美元
item.description: 玻利维亚新成立的国营黄金贸易公司计划在今年将黄金采购量翻两番，以此为陷入困境的玻利维亚中央银行增加黄金储备。【原文：Bolivia’s new state gold trading firm plans to quadruple purchases this year as a way of boosting reserves of the high-flying metal for the nation’s struggling central bank.】

item.title: Zara 亿万富翁首次分红 30 亿欧元
item.description: 阿曼西奥-奥尔特加（Amancio Ortega）今年将从他六十多年前创立的零售巨头 Inditex SA 获得 31 亿欧元（约合 34 亿美元）的分红，这是他首次超过 30 亿欧元的分红门槛。【原文：Amancio Ortega is set to receive €3.1 billion ($3.4 billion) in dividends this year from Inditex SA, the retail giant he founded more than six decades ago, the first time he’s surpassed the €3 billion threshold.】

item.title: 英格兰银行为员工加薪 3% 与通胀率相匹配
item.description: 英格兰银行将在 2025-26 年为其员工提供与通胀率相匹配的 3% 的加薪幅度，由于央行预测今年物价增长将回升，这一加薪幅度可能会让一些员工感到失望。【原文：The Bank of England will hand its staff an inflation-matching 3% pay rise in 2025-26, an award that may disappoint some employees with the central bank predicting a resurgence in price growth this year.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行的工作变得更难了

item.title: 津巴布韦市场监管机构命令企业用 ZiG 报告盈利情况
item.description: 津巴布韦股市监管机构已下令各公司以当地黄金支持的货币报告收益，并立即生效。【原文：Zimbabwe’s stock market regulator has ordered companies to report earnings in the local gold-backed currency, with immediate effect.】

item.title: DeepSeek 在 ChatGPT 缺席时接管香港市场
item.description: 欢迎阅读《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，纽利-珀内尔（Newley Purnell）从香港报道 DeepSeek 在全球最重要的金融中心之一迅速崛起。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Newley Purnell reports from Hong Kong on DeepSeek’s quick ascension in one of the world’s most important financial centers.】

item.title: 特朗普和马斯克的减税政策堪比撒切尔在 20 世纪 80 年代的紧缩政策
item.description:
即使像马斯克吹嘘的那样削减一小部分资金，也有可能对经济造成损害。【原文：

Even cuts a fraction as large as Musk has touted threaten to dent the economy.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第六周下降至 12 月以来最低点
item.description: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款平均利率连续第六周下降，降至 12 月初以来的最低水平，引发了购房和再融资活动的回升。【原文：The average US 30-year mortgage rate declined for a sixth straight week to the lowest level since early December, sparking a pickup in purchase and refinancing activity.】

item.title: 特朗普对全球金属征收关税，市场一片哗然
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统继续对全球钢铁和铝进口产品征收 25% 的关税，重启了他在第一任期内旨在遣返工厂工作岗位的战略之一，并将其贸易战扩大到全球大多数主要经济体。【原文：President Donald Trump went ahead with 25% tariffs on global steel and aluminum imports, reviving one of his first-term strategies aimed at repatriating factory jobs and widening his trade wars to most of the world’s major economies.】

item.title: 印度通胀进一步缓解，降息希望大增
item.description: 印度的通胀率在 2 月份降至七个月来的最低点，与中央银行的目标一致，并提高了进一步降息的希望。【原文：India’s inflation eased to a seven-month low in February, aligning with the central bank’s target and raising hopes of further interest rate cuts.】
